dead_rogue_J1: This isn't what I expected from the afterlife.
dead_rogue_J2: This isn't what I expected from the afterlife.
sc_ur_rogue_Guy1: [You aren't surprised to see t_c at the border. Again.]
Your kind can't just claim all of the territory!
[You explain, once again, to the rogue that they have more territory and freedom than StarClan cats.]
Yeah, well you better stay over there!
[Somethings never change, even when you're dead.]
sc_urrogue_ps_1: [You feel eyes peering at you from the fog, wandering near the border of stars and mist.]
[Briefly, you spot the ghost of a rogue, looking at your star-sewn pelt in awe.]
[Though, once they see you've spotted them, they turn tail and run.]
sc_urrogue_ps_2: [You turn to see an unfamiliar cat, standing half-in and half-out of the fog.]
I used to know one of you... though, I can't seem to remember who.
Would you mind asking your StarClan friends if they used to know me?
sc_urrogue_ps_3: [You find yourself a little lost, stumbling around the mist trying to find your way out.]
[You whirl around, spotting a cat who somehow seemed to sneak up on you.]
[They guide you out, but they seem to disappear when you go to thank them.]
sc_urrogue_ps_4: t_c. It meant a lot to me, even though it wasn't as grand as a Clancat's.
I take careful steps to ensure I never forget it.
live_df_ps_1: How curious... a creature, roaming these rooted confinements.
Do not be afraid, your fear will not aid you. I had to learn that the hard way, alone.
live_df_ps_2: It seems you are lost in more ways than one.
As am I, I suppose we have that much in common. Lucky you.
live_df_ps_3: You can run as much as you'd like.
In time, the trees will start to whisper misguidance to you.
Then, you will never find your way home.
live_df_ps_4: I've seen wondrous lands, even whilst alone and afraid.
It makes me bitter, you know. Knowing all that is out there...
Yet, the place I was supposed to call home is the same that drags me here.
live_df_ps_5: You can't trust anyone, I learnt that out there.
dead_outsider_J7: How awful must I have been, to end up in the hell for a belief that I didn't even hold?
Guess I'd better start learning some of this 'Clan' stuff. Hey, wanna teach me?
living_ur_rogue_Guy1: [You had left the camp to stretch your legs, and run into a strange spirit.]
Hey you! This is my territory!
[You explain that they are dead and have no claims to it.]
Thats- thats not true! I'm as alive as you are!
living_ur_rogue_Guy2: I fought you. I fought you and your Clan. You took our food, our shelter...
Why would I want to talk to you after that?
ur_parent_newborn_CM2: Taken in by those sly-hearted, mouse dung-eating 'Clan' cats.
I hope you have enough sense not to listen to them.
You_living_they_ur_CM1: Well, well. Look who we have here!
It's a little Clan cat, being all brave.
Come closer, little friend. I want to show you something.
[You shake your head, and they let out an amused purr.]
living_ur_kit_Guy1: Do you have a family, little one?
Oh... you're one of them. I'm glad you have someone to look out for you.
living_ur_Guy2: [t_c visibly flinches when they see you, their wispy, otherworldly pelt shaking.]
Oh- a Clancat! I didn't know I was on your territory... or that you could see me.
[The kittypet seems to disappear into mist in front of you. You can't help but wonder where they go.]
ur_parent_newborn_CM1: I told you that they were safe, even when they're so far away...
Now what did those nice cats name you again? y_c? Strange... but beautiful.
living_to_ur_kittypet_CM1: [t_c startles when you approach, the cat crouching a bit as they cower away from you.]
[You assure the kittypet that you won't hurt them.]
Really? Isn't that what you 'Clan' cats do? I thought you all hated housecats...
[You bring up the fact it doesn't make much sense to chase off a cat that's already dead.]
You're right, I suppose. Sometimes I swear others can see me, too, though. Not everycat is so kind... thank you, but I should leave.
[You give t_c a light wave of your tail as they disappear into the horizon beyond, their wispy shape fading into nothing but a pale glow.]
living_to_ur_kittypet_CM2: [You go out for a hunting trip, and upon a rock, basking in the early morning sunlight, sits a spirit, purring contently.]
[You move closer, and they tilt their head just enough to catch a glimpse of you, yawning.]
You wouldn't believe how hard it is to feel warm like this anymore.
You should join me, while you can still enjoy it to its fullest.
[After a moment, you clamber up onto the rock, pressing yourself close to the ghostly cat. They purr, shifting themself aside to give you the full ray of sun.]
dead_kittypet_J3: You know, the way you Clan cats live your lives is... interesting.
Why not just find some housefolk? They're very nice, and you can enjoy all sorts of things, like warm blankets, free food, and all the cuddles you want.
Why are you making that face?
dead_kittypet_J4: Hi! Um, I think I lost my housefolk. You wouldn't know where they are, would you?
Oh, housefolk are, like, these big cats with no fur, and they walk on their back paws, and they have these big warm dens full of lots of stuff!
Mine are very nice. They were very happy to have me, I just don't know where they went...
[You tell the kit that you're sorry, but you don't think you can help them.]
Oh, okay, that's fine. I'll keep looking.
dead_kittypet_J5: [You find t_c near the Clan border, staring off into the trees.]
Oh! Hi, y_c. I'm just... looking.
I lost my housefolk forever ago, and I feel like I'll never find them, when I look at how big the world is.
Do you think they're around here, somewhere? They must be so sad without me...
dead_kittypet_J6: [As soon as they catch sight of you, t_c turns and sprints away. You run to catch up, almost losing their translucent pelt in the scenery.]
[They stop short of a weird hole in the ground and point to it.]
Here! Look! It's a pawprint from some housefolk! There's a bunch of them! They came from this way!
They don't smell familiar, but, maybe they're from my housefolk, and they've finally come looking for me!
[You ensure t_c that, yes, maybe that's true, and at the same time, make a mental note to inform the rest of the Clan about Twolegs on the territory.]
ur_ur_rogue_Guy1: We may be dead, but I still expect you to respect my territory.
ur_ur_rogue_Guy2: Cross that line, and you cross me.
